page.title: 19Mayor of West Bromwich
page.content: Trung, Janine, Wendy,Jane,Harjit and I wrote to the Mayor of Sandwell asking if we might interview him for the Domesday project. We arranged the interview with his secretary. When we arrived the car park attendant took us to meet the Mayor's Assistant who took us to the Mayor's parlour. We shook hands with his Worship and sat down in black leather armchairs. The table in front of the Mayor was taken up by documents, silverware and a few trophies. It was a rich luxurious room as a lot of important people come to see the mayor. The mayor told us about Blanc-Mesnil, the French town twinned with West Bromwich. People from Blanc-Mesnil visit us and we visit them. We have pen-pals and send books and postcards to each other. It helps improve international relationships.M.Fiaz 13
